summary: The primary user-facing entry point for the WarpData library, providing high-level abstractions for loading, querying, and streaming datasets. It manages the lifecycle of dataset resolution, manifest auto-refreshing, and data engine integration.
responsibilities: Resolving dataset identifiers and version hashes into actionable manifests.
Providing a high-level Pythonic API for DuckDB-backed SQL queries and data previews.
Managing data streaming with support for distributed training sharding (rank/world_size).
Handling automatic manifest refreshing when remote data shards are missing or rotated (404 handling).
Orchestrating artifact resolution for binary data like images and audio via typed references.
Providing convenience methods for building and accessing vector embedding addons.
